dict.acceptation: 季节，季；时期；活动期，时令；暂时；

sent.orig: He talked of his travels in season and out of season.
With the coming of the season for reaping wheat, the busy harvest season will start.
sent.trans: 又到了小麦开镰的季节，农忙即将开始。

sent.orig: Forced strawberries can be found at the market in season or out of season.
sent.trans: 无论什么时令，都可以在市场上买到催熟的草莓。

sent.orig: I will sent you a season for sowing crops and a season for harvesting.
sent.trans: 我将给你们一个播种庄稼的季节和一个收获的季节。

sent.orig: The typhoon season in India is typically in a mid-season quiet period during the eclipse.
sent.trans: 日食期间，印度的台风季正处于季中的平静期。
